name: Lava Ice Run
description:
You have been transformed into a frictionless block of ice.
In order to survive you must endure the fiery inferno!

But you cannot go back! The heat of the air propels you forward!
Luckily, you have just enough control to leap from platform to platform.

The longer you last, the faster you go!
How long can you last before you slip and fall into the flames of the pit!

======================================================
Developer's Note:
======================================================
This is my first ORIGINAL app.
My next app is going to be story-driven.
Right now I'm making all my content completely free!
...and that's a great price.
